content.text: Pavlik is an infamous New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.
Pavlik is a fat man with short legs and arms. During the Battle of Marineford, he wore a hat and suit, under a pirate captain's coat, giving him a sort of mafia-like appearance.
Not much is known of Pavlik's personality, other than that he was willing to fight to save Ace.

Pavlik is a fearsome pirate who has managed to achieve an infamous reputation in the New World, and to make an alliance with Whitebeard. He is seen using a large flintlock in battle that, in the anime, was strong enough to cause damage to a Pacifista.
Some time prior to the current storyline, Pavlik became a known pirate in the New World and allied himself with Whitebeard.
When Portgas D. Ace was to be executed at Marineford, Pavlik joined forces with the Whitebeard Pirates to save him.
Immediately after the Vice Admirals entered the battle, Pavlik charged into battle alongside several of the other allied captains.
He, along with the rest of the crew, attended Whitebeard and Ace's funeral on a undisclosed island somewhere in the New World.

elements.text: Pavlik is diminutive of Russian name Pavel (corresponding to English name Paul).
↑  One Piece Manga and Anime — Vol. 57 Chapter 553 and Episode 477, Pavlik makes his debut.
↑  One Piece Green: Secret Pieces (p. 362), Pavlik's name is revealed.
↑  One Piece Manga — Vol. 57 Chapter 553, The allied captains charge into battle.
